author: tinaslt
content: Hi  every body. Can HD wallet be implemented in Ethereum? (Because of the account-based and non UTXO structure)

author: sky.cactus
content: Yes, and it is.  However, it would be somewhat unreasonable to have every transfer move all of your money to a new account like with UTXOs so people usually use HD Wallets but just utilize a few of them for specific purposes.
